FROM CONCEPT TO CUSTOMER

AN INTEGRATED SOLUTION TO YOUR MANUFACTURING NEEDS

AN INTEGRATED SOLUTION TO YOUR MANUFACTURING NEEDS

ElectroFlow is a AS9100 certified micro electronics company, capable of manufacturing complex printed circuit assemblies. We specialize in low volume system critical devices for the medical and military industries where quality is paramount. ElectroFlow offers a complete end to end solution from inital product design and devleopment through manufacture and onto distrubution and service.

Electronics Manufacture

TOTAL PROCESS CONTROL

At ElectroFlow we understand the importance of process control. With over 20 years of experience and sustained practice of ISO quality systems and organisational frameworks such as 5s, ElectroFlow fosters a culture of continuous improvement. We can meet the exacting standards of our clients and call on our vast experience to improve processes where possible.
